descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic taps the ball to Norman Powell who cans the 3 from the wing.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic’s slick touch pass to Powell leads to the 3) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic's slick touch pass to Powell leads to the 3

videos.description: Michael Porter Jr. knocks down a couple tough 3-pointers as part of a monster first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (MPJ shows off the range with two tough 3’s in the first quarter) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: MPJ shows off the range with two tough 3's in the first quarter

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony finds a cutting CJ McCollum who pulls himself up on the rim after the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McCollum pulls himself up on the rim after the dunk) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: McCollum pulls himself up on the rim after the dunk

videos.description: Damian Lillard nails the step-back 3-pointer right before the first-half buzzer, which gets the Portland crowd on their feet.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard has the crowd on their feet after tough step-back 3) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard has the crowd on their feet after tough step-back 3

videos.description: Nikola Jokic hits Jusuf Nurkic with a series of moves before putting in the and-1 floater.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic has Nurkic going in every direction on and-1) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic has Nurkic going in every direction on and-1

videos.description: Monte Morris brings Denver within 3 after flipping in the running 3-pointer right at the third-quarter buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Morris hits the running 3 at the third-quarter buzzer) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morris hits the running 3 at the third-quarter buzzer

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony knocks down the and-1 and lets the Denver bench hear about it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo has words with the Denver bench after and-1) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo has words with the Denver bench after and-1

videos.description: Nikola Jokic hits the long 3-pointer, which has JaVale McGee falling to the floor.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic’s 3 has JaVale McGee on the floor) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic's 3 has JaVale McGee on the floor

videos.description: Aaron Gordon ends the Blazers' season with a cold-blooded 3 right in front of the Portland bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gordon ends Blazers' season with dagger 3) 2021/06/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gordon ends Blazers' season with dagger 3
